author: A_Brickset_user
title: pretty neat set
review: This is a pretty cool set to own. Its not really much, but compared to the tiny modern engines, its a lot of fun to play with and put it in a mini-fig size boat and pretend its a giant diesel. the bright colors make it a great desk ornament as well (surprisingly enough), and i have gotten many comments on it.

author: Lego_Moose
title: Amazing
review:
I found the instructions for this set an a old box of lego I bought. 

I am a car enthusiat so it was really cool to make the engines. 

I hooked up the V6 engine to a more recent electrical motor and it worked great. 

It even makes its own distinct engine thumping sound that is really cool.

Really neat seeing how the crankshaft works. 

Overall a great set and would recommend to anyone
